list.abs: India captivates Mr Jack because it preserves some vestiges of this dead civilisation in tropical aspic , " frozen in the Victorian economy of the lower Ganges " .杰克先生对印度着了迷，因为这块美味的热带肉冻中保留了一些死去的文明的残余，“被冻结在低等的恒河中的维多利亚经济“。
fermentation face with powder to make skin , filling in addition to fresh meat fish , shrimp , chicken , ham , the yet to join aspic .用精粉酵面作皮，馅料除鲜肉、虾仁、鸡肉、火腿外，尚加入肉冻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French, literally asp', from the colours of the jelly as compared with those of the snake

entry.def: Aspic is a clear shiny jelly made from meat juices. It is used in making cold savoury meat dishes.

means.word_mean: 1. savory jelly based on fish or meat stock used as a mold for meats or vegetables
